verses.content: David chun, “Hi hi LALPA Pathien in a na, hi hi Israel ta dinga pumrawhmang thilinhlânna mâichâm chu a nih,” a ta.
David chun Israel rama mikhuol umhai chu kei khâwm dingin thu a pêk a; Pathien in bâwlna dinga lung sut dingin lung suttuhai a ruot a.
David chun ân huonna kawt- khâra ding le a zawmna vêlhaia dingin thîr tamtak a kilna dingin a buotsai a; dârsen chi tamtak el a bûk hriet lo,
Sidar thing a nizât hriet lo; Zidon mihai le Tura mihai khan David kuomah Sidar thing an hung lâk ṭeu sih a.

Chun, David chun, “Ka naupa Solomon hi a naupangin iengkhawm a hriet si nawh a, LALPA ta dinga in bâwl ding hi ropuitak a ni ding a na, ram po poa ropuitak le hming inthang tak el ding a ni sih a; chuleiin, keiin buotsai ka tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, David chun a thi hma ngei chun nasatakin a buotsai tah a.
Chun, a naupa Solomon chu a ko a; Israelhai Pathien, LALPA ta dinga in bâwl dingin thu a pêk tah a.
David chun Solomon kuomah, “Ka naupa, keia ta ding chun ka Pathien LALPA hming ta dinga in bâwl chu ka lungrilah a um a.

Nisienlakhawm, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a, ‘Nang chun thisen tamtak în suo tah a, indona ropuitakhaia khawm i ṭhang tah a; ka mithmua hnuoi chunga thisen tamtak în suo ta leiin ka hming ta dingin in bâwl naw ti ni,

Ngai ta, naupasal hung nei i ta, ama chu mi sâwldamtak nîng a tih, a vêlin, a hmêlmahaia inthawk khawm- in ama chu râlmuongna pêng ka ta, a hming khawm Solomon nîng a ta, ama hun laia chun Israel rama hin muongna le râlmuongna pêng ka tih;
keia hming ta dingin in bâwl a ta, ama chu ka naupa nîng a ta, kei ama pa ni bawk ka tih; chun, a ram lalṭhungpha chu Israel chungah kumkhawtluongin sukdet ka tih,’ tiin.
Tuhin, ka naupa, LALPA chu i kuomah um a ta, inhlâwtlingtir a ti cheh a, nangma chungthua a hril ta angin, i Pathien LALPA in chu bâwl la.
LALPA chun hrietthiem theina le thlierthiem theina pe sienla che; Israel chunga thuneina pe raw se che; chuongchun, LALPA i Pathien dân chu i kawl zing theina dingin,
Israel chungthua LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk, rorêlna hai le dânhai chu thaw dinga i zâwm tlat chun hung hlawtling i tih; insukhrât la, insukhuoi la, beidawng naw la, ṭit khawm ṭi naw rawh.

Tuhin ngai ta, ka theitâwk hu ang peiin, LALPA in ta ding chun rângkachak talent nuoi khat, tang- karuo talent maktaduoi khat, dârsen le thîr chu a bûk zât hriet lo ka buotsai tah a; chu ding chun, lung le thing khawm a tam tâwkin ka buotsai tah a nih; chu chu sunzawm thei i ta.
Chunawa khawm, i kuomah sinthawtuhai tam tâwk tak, lung suttuhai, a âttuhai, thing thaw mi, sin tinrênga themthiem mihai;
rângkachak le, tangkaruo le, thîr le dârsena themthiemhai, nizât hriet sêng lo rau an na; tho la, thaw el rawh, LALPA chu i kuomah um a tih,” tiin.
David chun Israel hotuhai po po chu a naupa Solomon chu ṭhangpui dingin thu a pêk bawk a;

“LALPA in Pathien chu in kuomah a um a ni naw am a nih? Kil tin ela chun muongna a pêk cheu a ni naw am a nih? A ram hluotuhai chu ka kutah a hung pêk tâwl ta sih a; chun, a ram khawm chu LALPA le a mihai hmaa chun an intuklût ta sih a.

Tuhin, LALPA in Pathien chu zawng dingin in lungril le in lungvar chu ama tieng ngha unla, tho unla, chuongchun, LALPA Pathien hmun inthieng; LALPA thuthlungna bâwm le, Pathien bûr le bêl inthienghai chu hung lâkna dingin, LALPA hmingin in bâwl ro,” tiin.
